title.value: Mechanics and technological basis for improvement of post-harvest processing of flax heap for seeds
Механико-технологические основы совершенствования послеуборочной обработки льновороха на семена

person.name: Kudryavtsev, A.N., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied mechanics and technological aspects for improvement of post-harvest processing of flax heap for seeds. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. As a result of realized research there were revealed agro-biological, physical, mechanical and technological properties of flax heap and flax seeds. The prerequisites of postharvest flax heap improving, as well as information about the processing of flax heap of modern technologies and equipment for their implementation were presented. The results of theoretical and experimental studies of dosing, dryness and cleaning of seed piles, as well as data on their practical use in modern enterprises of AIC were shown. Rational design and technological schemes of technical means were justified, methodology of analysis and design was proposed. Recommendations for the choice of the optimal parameters of working bodies of these devices with the structural mass, mechanical and aerodynamic properties of flax heap and its main components as the seed processing facilities were given. The results of development and research of flax seed separators-cleaners were presented.
